page.title: 14EDUCATION IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: At primary school you usually start at the age of five. When you progress through the school from Primary 1-7 the work becomes harder. It is called primary school because this is the first school you go to. When you are in Primary 4, 5, 6, and 7 you get Geography and History. You can get activities like P.E., Art, Sewing and Singing. In most classes you would expect to get a project of some kind. There are school outings which go to Millport, Culzean Castle and lots of other places. Our hours at school are from 9 o'clock in the morning till quarter past 3 in the afternoon. Pupils leave the primary at the age of 11 or 12. In primary school the teacher has a time-table. The time-table tells you when you get P.E. and T.V. programmes.
